name: Pizza Delivery Bike Rider
description:
One of the most addictive Pizza Delivery Bike Game on AppStore!!

Download Pizza Delivery Bike Rider For Free!!

The road is full of traffic and rivals and you have very less time to deliver the pizza. Only someone who can take his ride to its extremes can deliver the pizza on time.

But be aware the road is full of fast moving vehicles

Come Take the pizza Bike challenge if you Dare.

Whether you are the lover of Free Pizza, Bikes, Cars, Car racing, Bike Racing, Bike Race or motorcycle games for Kids, boys and girls or games similar to these themes you are going to love this game.
Get it now and Enjoy!
